headline: In Retirement, They Help Immigrants Find Their Way in New York
abstract: Maher and Salwa Gendy recall feeling adrift after arriving in the United States from Egypt. Now they help members of their church get benefits and prepare for the citizenship test.
lead_paragraph: It has been four decades since Maher Gendy arrived in New York from his native Egypt, yet the memories of his struggles to adjust to a new country, a new city and a new language remain vivid.
keywords: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
Community Service Society of New York
